LongDescription:
Risk of Fire or Injury! 
 DO NOT puncture, disassemble, crush, heat, or burn! 
 Tired of going to settings to see how much juice your Siri Remote has left? 
 Wish there was an easier way? 
 Well now with Apple Juice you can! 
 Just click the module in the Control Center and you're good to go! 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Changelog: 
 Version 1.0-1 - Release. 
 Version 1.0.1-1 Fixes an issue where the module wouldn't show. 
 Version 1.0.2-1 tvOS 13 Support.
